topic.title: My Computer is dying.
topic.body:
everytime i scroll in a Chan I keep download bullshit shitpost content worth nothing.
can't you make the content click to show please.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Am i allowed to say nigger ?

> [niggerman69](#comment_1_1LqBmfU8v7MjQWdX8veLtbXuqmDvACw4vM): Am i allowed to say nigger ?

Responce test

1565549694_1GUhkGiS4PmRreV33ddFfEMqfdgjJ.body: ok reddit man welcome to 8chan's refugee centre.

1565617632_1LdgxNSynzpd5Vyi3Ej12adEuWbo1.body: nah, i rather play Minecraft right now.

1565639606_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body:
If i use processing power to receive and control information, id say its the opposite of a communist system.
plus i agree by cloning Zeronet to spread information to other peers, building a community away from central server.
Totally what libertarians intended.

1565638982_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body: Capitalism rewards those serving the community: "You served someone, you get payed for it."
